A candidate is      randomly selected from a bonded candidate set using snapshotted data to prevent bias.      Key security properties:      - Candidates must post a significant bond (BOND_SIZE)      - Candidates are punished if they fail to propose or prove (FAILED_HATCH_PUNISHMENT)      - All exits incur a tax (WITHDRAWAL_TAX)      - Candidate set is snapshotted before RANDAO to prevent manipulation      - Candidate does NOT receive access to The amount deducted from bond on exit

initiateExit().custom:reverts: EscapeHatch__NotInCandidateSet if caller is not in the candidate set                 (including when caller was just selected as proposer by selectCandidates)EscapeHatch__InvalidStatus if caller's status is not ACTIVE
initiateExit().details: The exit may be immediate or delayed depending on timing relative to next hatch.      Calls selectCandidates() first, which may select the caller as the designated      proposer for an upcoming hatch. If the caller is selected, their status transitions      to PROPOSING and they are removed from $activeCandidates, causing the subsequent      checks to revert. This is intentional - a designated proposer cannot exit and must      instead follow the PROPOSING -> validateProofSubmission -> EXITING -> leaveCandidateSet      flow.

returns._0: True if the address is in the active candidate set

returns.isOpen: True if the epoch is within the escape hatch active duration
returns.proposer: The designated proposer for this hatch (address(0) if none or not open)

returns._0: True if the hatch has been prepared
True if the hatch has been validated

joinCandidateSet().custom:reverts: EscapeHatch__HatchTooEarly if called during early period when exit would revertEscapeHatch__AlreadyInCandidateSet if caller is already in the candidate setEscapeHatch__InvalidStatus if caller has a non-NONE status
joinCandidateSet().details: Transfers BOND_SIZE tokens from the caller

leaveCandidateSet().custom:reverts: EscapeHatch__InvalidStatus if caller's status is not EXITINGEscapeHatch__NotExitableYet if exitableAt has not been reached
leaveCandidateSet().details: Only callable after exitableAt timestamp has passed

selectCandidates().custom:reverts: EscapeHatch__SetUnstable if called before the freeze timestamp (defense in depth)
selectCandidates().details: Called permissionlessly to set up the next hatch. Uses snapshotted      candidate set and RANDAO for unbiased selection.

updateSubmittedArchive(address,uint128,b.custom:reverts: EscapeHatch__OnlyRollup if caller is not the Rollup contract

params._archive: The archive root of the proposed checkpoint
params._checkpointNumber: The checkpoint number being proposed, safely downcasted to 32 bits

validateProofSubmission(uint256).custom:reverts: EscapeHatch__AlreadyValidated if the hatch has already been validatedEscapeHatch__NoDesignatedProposer if no proposer was designated for the hatchEscapeHatch__InvalidStatus if proposer's status is not PROPOSINGEscapeHatch__NotExitableYet if called before exitableAt timestamp
validateProofSubmission(uint256).details: Checks that blocks were proposed and proven. Applies punishment if not.      This is the ONLY way to transition from PROPOSING to EXITING.

LAG_IN_EPOCHS_FOR_RANDAO().notice: Number of epochs to look back from the START of the hatch for stable RANDAO

LAG_IN_EPOCHS_FOR_SET_SIZE().notice: Number of epochs to look back from the START of the hatch for stable candidate set

getActiveDuration().notice: Get the active duration of each escape hatch in epochs

getBondSize().notice: Get the required bond size for candidates

getCandidateAtIndex(uint256).notice: Get the candidate address at a given index in the current active set

getCandidateAtIndexForHatch(uint256,uint.notice: Get the candidate address at a given index in the snapshot for a target hatch

getCandidateCount().notice: Get the current number of active candidates

getCandidateCountForHatch(uint256).notice: Get the number of candidates in the snapshot for a target hatch

getCurrentHatch().notice: Get the current hatch based on the current epoch

getDesignatedProposer(uint256).notice: Get the designated proposer for a hatch

getFailedHatchPunishment().notice: Get the punishment for failing to fulfill proposer duties

getFirstEpoch(uint256).notice: Get the first epoch of a hatch

getFrequency().notice: Get the frequency of escape hatches in epochs

getHatch(uint256).notice: Convert an epoch to its corresponding hatch number

getLagInHatches().notice: Get the lag in hatches for candidate selection

getProposingExitDelay().notice: Get the additional exit delay after proposing

getSeedTimestamp(uint256).notice: Get the seed timestamp for a target hatch's RANDAO sampling

getSetTimestamp(uint256).notice: Get the freeze timestamp for a target hatch's candidate snapshot

getWithdrawalTax().notice: Get the withdrawal tax applied when exiting

initiateExit().notice: Initiate exit from the candidate set

isCandidate(address).notice: Check if an address is in the candidate set

isHatchOpen(uint256).notice: Check if an epoch is within an open escape hatch period

isHatchPrepared(uint256).notice: Check if a hatch has been prepared

isHatchValidated(uint256).notice: Check if a hatch has been validated

joinCandidateSet().notice: Join the escape hatch candidate set by depositing the required bond

leaveCandidateSet().notice: Complete exit from the candidate set and reclaim bond minus tax

selectCandidates().notice: Prepare the designated proposer for an upcoming escape hatch

updateSubmittedArchive(address,uint128,b.notice: Update the last submitted archive for a proposer during escape hatch

validateProofSubmission(uint256).notice: Validate that the designated proposer fulfilled their duty
